txt.en: Freed Warg cubs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat the cub-snatchers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Stay your hand, [placeholder]. I am in no shape to fight you.\n\n'I can see that you are a formidable foe, and you seem not to be associated with the scum who stole my cubs. Listen to my tale, then decide whether I should be destroyed.'
Find and defeat the Warg
Return to Nakrovak
Defeated the cub-snatchers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A vicious Warg prowls the upper tiers of Clovengap, blocking access to enemy camps in the ruins beyond.
Rescue the Warg cubs
Return to Nakrovak
Nakrovak is in eastern Clovengap.\n\nYou have freed Nakrovak's cubs. You should ensure they all made it back to her safely.
Nakrovak is in eastern Clovengap.\n\nNakrovak, a crystal-encrusted Warg, has asked you to listen to her tale.
The Warg prowls the highest tier in western Clovengap.\n\nBorghild has asked you to deal with a vicious Warg who blocks the army's progress.
Speak to Nakrovak
Overcoming Corruption's Call

'I owe you a great debt, [placeholder]. My intention is that our paths never cross again. If they do, however, and you require assistance, I will be there.\n\n'My children and I will leave Clovengap once I have recovered.'

'One of the scouts reported a vicious Warg who prowls the upper tiers north of here. She blocks access to enemy camps in the ruins beyond. Defeat her, so that our armies may march on the Angmarim unhindered.'
DNT -  Beneath the crumbling arches of ancient vineyards prowls a deadly foe. Has the corruption of the sarrowstones altered this already formidable foe?

'I am Nakrovak. My mate and I were captured many moons ago by Men in robes. They chanted over us and pierced our hides with crystals. The pain and the ensorcelled crystals drove my mate mad.

'The crystals had a different effect on me, however. My mind grew clearer. My body stronger. Rage and hunger were once all I knew. Now, there is sorrow, grief, and… something else I cannot explain. A softness….

'I managed to get away from my captors, but they found my den, weakened me with poison, and stole my cubs. As you have seen, I am not yet at my full strength.

'I dare not wait for the effects of the poison to wear off, for my cubs are in danger. Please, rescue them, and we will leave this place and go far away from two-legged peoples and their sorceries.'
Nakrovak's cubs are held prisoner in eastern Clovengap.\n\nAngmarim sorcerers have cubnapped Nakrovak's litter! You should defeat the Angmarim!
Free Warg cubs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'I dare not wait for the effects of the poison to wear off, for my cubs are in danger. Please, rescue them, and we will leave this place and go far away from two-legged peoples and their sorceries.'
Nakrovak's cubs are held prisoner in eastern Clovengap.\n\nWith the Angmarim defeated, you should release the Warg cubs.
